channel.title: Conference on Ding's Coding Forge
channel.description: Recent content in Conference on Ding's Coding Forge

item.title: [Go] Gophercon 2024 - Building Minimalistic Backend Microservice in Go
item.description: Say goodbye to unnecessary frameworks—it's time to go back to the basics. This post demonstrates how to build minimalistic backend applications using pure vanilla Go.

item.title: [Go] Gophercon 2024 - Go Project Guide from A to Z
item.description: How to structure projects in Go, a language without rigid frameworks like Spring. This post introduces practical patterns for feature-driven development and enterprise-level application design.

item.title: [Go] Gophercon 2024 - Kubernetes Platform Programming
item.description: How to use the Kubernetes API with Go… and deploy applications using Operators
